synopsis.text: Hiiro Yano, Aoi Miyake, and the rest of the crew from Lyrical Lily are back with a yearlong town revitalization event! To keep the energy high and the beats fresh, they'll be joined by some of the hottest DJ units around, including Merm4id and RONDO. But when Rika Seto starts acting out of the ordinary during a swimsuit photo shoot, the other members of Merm4id take notice. Meanwhile, Tsubaki Aoyagi of RONDO is lost in thought, dreaming of expanding their world. After a live concert at ALTER-EGO, Rika makes a surprise proposal that could change everything - a joint performance between Merm4id and RONDO. But with their contrasting styles, can they make it work? Don't miss this special episode of D4DJ Double Mix, where the beats drop and the stakes are high!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
